config_file.description: config_file is read in the situation where URL is blank - and therefore this is a base config.

files.description: AdditionalFiles are used to add additional files to the model

gallery.description: Gallery is a reference to the gallery which contains the model

installed.description: Installed is used to indicate if the model is installed or not

overrides.description: Overrides are used to override the configuration of the model located at URL

deletion.description: Deletion is true if the operation is a deletion

config_file.description: config_file is read in the situation where URL is blank - and therefore this is a base config.

files.description: AdditionalFiles are used to add additional files to the model

gallery.description: Gallery is a reference to the gallery which contains the model

installed.description: Installed is used to indicate if the model is installed or not

overrides.description: Overrides are used to override the configuration of the model located at URL

created.description: The time at which the assistant was created.

file_ids.description: A list of file IDs attached to this assistant.

id.description: The unique identifier of the assistant.

instructions.description: The system instructions that the assistant uses.

metadata.description: Set of key-value pairs attached to the assistant.

model.description: The model ID used by the assistant.

tools.description: A list of tools enabled on the assistant.

bytes.description: Size of the file in bytes

created_at.description: The time at which the file was created

purpose.description: The purpose of the file (e.g., "fine-tune", "classifications", etc.)

function_call.description: A result of a function call

name.description: The message name (used for tools calls)

batch.description: Custom parameters - not present in the OpenAI API

function_call.description: might be a string or an object

functions.description: A list of available functions to call

grammar.description: A grammar to constrain the LLM output

language.description: Also part of the OpenAI official spec

messages.description: Messages is read only by chat/completion API calls

model.description: Also part of the OpenAI official spec

n.description: Also part of the OpenAI official spec. use it for returning multiple results

prompt.description: Prompt is read only by completion/image API calls

top_p.description: Common options between all the API calls, part of the OpenAI spec

language.description: (optional) language to use with TTS model

voice.description: voice audio file or speaker id
